Log images

# Quick hack to load local SDK code
import os
os.chdir(os.path.join(os.getcwd(), ".."))

# Load API key and secret from environment variables
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv()

# Initialize ValidMind SDK
import validmind as vm
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.image as mpimg

print(os.getcwd())
/Users/panchicore/www/validmind/validmind-sdk

ValidMind SDK Introduction

vm.init(project="cl2r3k1ri000009jweny7ba1g")
run_cuid = vm.start_run()
print(run_cuid)
cl5ciojr70000c1sr0usfmiq0

Log Image from path

path_to_img = "notebooks/images/jupiter_png.png"

img = mpimg.imread(path_to_img)
imgplot = plt.imshow(img)

metadata = {"caption": "Y Planet", "vars": ["a", "b", "c"], "config": {"x": 1, "y": 2}}
vm.log_figure(path_to_img, key="jupiter", metadata=metadata, run_cuid=run_cuid)

Log plot

import numpy as np


fig, ax = plt.subplots()

mu, sigma = 100, 15
x = mu + sigma * np.random.randn(10000)
n, bins, patches = ax.hist(x, 50, density=1, facecolor='g', alpha=0.75)


ax.set_xlabel('Smarts')
ax.set_ylabel('Probability')
ax.set_title('Histogram of IQ')
ax.text(60, .025, r'$\mu=100,\ \sigma=15$')
ax.axis([40, 160, 0, 0.03])
ax.grid(True)

metadata = {"caption": "The Caption", "vars": ["a", "b"], "config": {"x": 1, "y": 2}}
vm.log_figure(fig, key="matplot", metadata=metadata, run_cuid=run_cuid)

{'key': 'matplot',
 'url': 'https://vm-dev-api-project-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/cl2r3k1ri000009jweny7ba1g/figures/matplot.png'}

Log plot with seaborn

import seaborn as sns

sns.set_theme(style="ticks", color_codes=True)
tips = sns.load_dataset("tips")
catplot = sns.catplot(x="day", y="total_bill", data=tips)

metadata = {"caption": "The Caption", "vars": ["a", "b"], "config": {"x": 1, "y": 2}}
vm.log_figure(catplot.fig, key="seaborn", metadata=metadata, run_cuid=run_cuid)
{'key': 'seaborn',
 'url': 'https://vm-dev-api-project-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/cl2r3k1ri000009jweny7ba1g/figures/seaborn.png'}
